Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 19th overall pick, by Cincinnati in 1967...
Injured on 5/7/1968 with a Blister On Finger, out for 4 days...
Earned first career win on 4/7/1971...
Had first career hit on 4/16/1971, off Andy Messersmith (CHC)...
Injured on 9/8/1975 with a Bone Chips Elbow, out for 5-6 weeks...
Injured on 7/24/1978 with a Inflamed Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Atlanta on 2/2/1979 to a 2-year deal worth $1,800,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Oakland on 2/11/1981 to a 3-year deal worth $2,400,000 per year...
